Name: MARK
Content: MARK is my own perosnal voice assistant for windows. MARK is my graduation project which was made with my fellowe peer using python as a main source of language. Out of 20000 projects, it was the only project to have start-up offer.

Name: Interaction Design
Content: It was a group project which was led by me where we redesigned two streams of humbercurrent.ca as a challenge and it was successfully done by my whole team.

Name: Breathing Exercise
Content: It is an exercise which helps people to reduce anxiety and depression from their day to day lives. All they have to do is follow the instructions and do the exercise.
